title: 1.046 EVIDENCE OF CONSENT.
text:
The consent of the state given under sections 1.041 to 1.048 to the acquisition by the United States of any land or right or interest in land in this state or to the exercise of jurisdiction over any place in this state shall be evidenced by the certificate of the governor, issued in duplicate, under the great seal of the state, upon application by an authorized officer of the United States and upon proof that title to the property has vested in the United States. The certificate shall set forth
(a) a description of the property,
(b) the authority for, purpose of, and method used in acquiring it, and
(c) the conditions of the jurisdiction of the state and the United States over it,
and shall declare the consent of the state under sections 1.041 to 1.048, as the case may require. When necessary for proper identification of the property a map may be attached to the certificate, and the applicant may be required to furnish it. One duplicate of the certificate shall be filed with the secretary of state. The other shall be delivered to the applicant, who shall record it in the office of the county recorder of each county in which the land or any part of it is situated.

variables.name: application_by_authorized_officer
variables.description: Indicates if the application is made by an authorized officer of the United States.

variables.name: title_vested_in_us
variables.description: Indicates if the title to the property has vested in the United States.

consequences: The governor issues a certificate under the great seal of the state.

variables.name: certificate_issued
variables.description: Indicates if the certificate has been issued by the governor.

variables.name: certificate_contains_description
variables.description: Indicates if the certificate contains a description of the property.

variables.name: certificate_contains_authority_purpose_method
variables.description: Indicates if the certificate contains the authority for, purpose of, and method used in acquiring the property.

variables.name: certificate_contains_conditions
variables.description: Indicates if the certificate contains the conditions of the jurisdiction of the state and the United States over the property.

consequences: The certificate declares the consent of the state under sections 1.041 to 1.048.

variables.name: certificate_filed_with_secretary_of_state
variables.description: Indicates if one duplicate of the certificate is filed with the secretary of state.

variables.name: certificate_delivered_to_applicant
variables.description: Indicates if the other duplicate of the certificate is delivered to the applicant.

variables.name: certificate_recorded_in_county
variables.description: Indicates if the certificate is recorded in the office of the county recorder of each county in which the land or any part of it is situated.

consequences: The certificate process is completed as required by law.
